txt.en: 'Roving Threats have been seen within the Realm of Eriador. You may find them in the Regions of <rgb=#FF0000>Angmar</rgb>, <rgb=#FF0000>Evendim</rgb>, <rgb=#FF0000>Forochel</rgb>, <rgb=#FF0000>The Misty Mountains, or <rgb=#FF0000>The North Downs</rgb></rgb>.'
Tell me about Eriador Roving Threats.
